bilingual.source: Apparently, the weather in Yosemite can change without warning.
bilingual.target: 显然，约塞米蒂的天气会毫无预警地变化。

bilingual.source: Apparently, he forgot to lock the door.

bilingual.target: 显然地，她没有收到消息。

bilingual.source: Apparently, the weather will be sunny tomorrow.
bilingual.target: 显然地，明天天气会晴朗。

bilingual.source: Apparently, they are not coming to the party.
bilingual.target: 显然地，他们不会来参加聚会。

bilingual.source: Apparently, the meeting was canceled without notice.
bilingual.target: 显然地，会议在没有通知的情况下被取消了。

bilingual.source: The internet is apparently taking down yet another industry.
bilingual.target: 互联网显然正在摧毁另一个行业。

bilingual.source: Apparently, we look down on acquaintances more so than friends.
bilingual.target: 显然，比起朋友，我们更看不起熟人。

bilingual.source: It fell through the wooden floorboards, apparently lost forever.
bilingual.target: 它从木地板上掉了下去，显然是再也找不到了。

list.abstract: 《Apparently》是美国说唱歌手J.Cole第三张录音室专辑《2014ForestHillsDrive》中的首支主打单曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, apparently, they're pretty good seats. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 位子显然很好。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Why? Apparently, he scares easy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，为什么？他显然易受惊吓。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, whatever they're looking for is in the Ojal prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然，他们要找的东西在欧哈监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, because apparently that's the only way to get your attention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为显然那是唯一吸引你注意力的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, there is no law of diminishing comedic returns with space poop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然，用太空便便做笑点完全无懈可击呢。

yingyinNormal.en: And, apparently, Wil Wheaton's best friend. Sheldon. Talk to the hand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然他是威尔·惠顿的死党呢。谢尔顿。懒得鸟你。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, if you're Sheldon, all you need to do is turn your back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然啊，如果你是谢尔顿的话，你需要做的只是转个身而已。

yingyinNormal.en: But there's a rat problem. Apparently, they're attracted to dryer sheets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是现在有老鼠了，它们显然对烘干机里的香料纸感兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, he's the Prince. Apparently they had some big ceremony before I was born.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是个王子，显然，他们在我出生前有个大型仪式。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, you did not know that the chef's salad is kitchen trickery to utilize scrap meat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然，你不知道推荐沙拉是食堂的杂碎肉骗人把戏。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing? I have a craving for white asparagus that apparently is destined to go unsatisfied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在干什么？我特别想吃白芦笋，但显然未能如愿。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, apparently Chandler's angry at us for not getting him a ticket to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德显然是在气我们2星期前，没帮他买球票。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny laid into me, too. Apparently, I'm overly fixated on premium Swiss chocolate bars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮也把我骂了一顿。显然，我过分专注在优质的瑞士巧克力棒上。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, I'm not artsy enough and have too many legs. So now I'm on Go Fund Yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很显然我不够文艺而且我腿太多，所以我投奔"为自己集资"站了。

yingyinNormal.en: Your brother is being very mysterious about our date tonight. He's a very mysterious guy, apparently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你哥一直对我们今晚的约会保持神秘。很显然，他是个很神秘的家伙。

yingyinNormal.en: And I didn't hear anything he said after that. Apparently, selling clothes makes us a chick site.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他说什么我都听不进去了。显然，服装销售让我们成了一个小妞网站。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a request I can live with. I'm partial to the Kardashians, myself. As apparently as her majesty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这要求我勉强能接受，我个人更喜欢卡戴珊姐妹，女王陛下显然也是。

yingyinNormal.en: I called the department secretary to see what happened. Apparently, I have a reputation for being obnoxious.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打电话问学院秘书是怎么回事，显然，全校的人都认为我很讨厌。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know, but apparently I'm in some kind of relationship, and you seem to be an expert at ending them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道但显然我陷进某种关系里了，而你似乎很擅长结束这种关系。

yingyinNormal.en: Not they, he. Apparently, that Gorg is last Gorg. That is why rock was so important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是他们，是“他”。显然，那个格尔人是最后一个格尔族人了。这就是为什么这块石头那么重要。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看来; 显然; 似乎

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 看来; 显然; 似乎

examination_example.sentence: These range from around £500 to $5,000, and <highlight>apparently</highlight> the work gets more expensive the more that publishers do it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些（收费金额）从500英镑至5000美元不等，显而易见，出版机构的准备工作越多，文献发表便越昂贵。

examination_example.sentence: Not only are the tasks <highlight>apparently</highlight> infinite, the co-workers are much harder to motivate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这并非仅因这些任务没完没了，还因你的合作者很难使唤。

examination_example.sentence: This is <highlight>apparently</highlight> the reason McDonald's restricts the availability of its popular McRib — a marketing trick that has turned the pork sandwich into an object of obsession.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这显然是麦当劳限制其广受欢迎的烤汁猪排堡供应的原因——一种将猪肉三明治变成痴迷对象的营销技巧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看来; 显然; 似乎

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Apparently</highlight>, we look down on acquaintances more so than friends.

examination_example.sentence: The internet is <highlight>apparently</highlight> taking down yet another industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 互联网显然正在摧毁另一个行业。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看来; 显然; 似乎

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 清晰可见的；清晰明了的；明显的；表面上的；貌似真实的；从地球上看到的

sense_info_list.zh: 看来; 显然; 似乎

examination_example.sentence: Psychologists have shown that babies <highlight>apparently</highlight> expect their world to comply with the laws of physics and cause and effect as early as two months of age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 心理学家表示，婴儿显然早在两个月大的时候就期望自己的世界符合物理学和因果律。

examination_example.sentence: Pedals <highlight>apparently</highlight> has an injured leg or paw that doesn't allow it to walk comfortably on all fours according to experts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据专家的说法，Pedals显然有一条腿或一只爪子受伤了，不能用四只脚舒服地行走。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看来; 似乎; 显然

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 看来; 似乎; 显然

examination_example.sentence: I couldn't see Don, but as I approached the tractor he jumped out onto the road, <highlight>apparently</highlight> unhurt, and dashed back to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看不到Don，但当我走近拖拉机时，他跳到了路上，显然没有受伤，并冲回我身边。
